::Grounded::
"If what you say is true...that he has amnesia and you are woried if
it goes away..I amy be able to help. If you cna convince him and allow
me to do some mechanical 'repairs' to his cerebal circuts i may be
able to completely get rid of his old memories completely by erasing
all that happened before this amnesia came on....but there is a chance
that i could reawaken the memories while i am at it causing him to
revert to his old self...whatever that may be...before i can erase it.
So it is up to you and the others if you would like me to do this
little ' repair'. So maybe talk this over with the others and i have
to go do some defense things i promised Windlord i would do when i wa
finished in the lab. Do you know where i might find some stationary
guns.?"
